reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting Southern-Vietnam Solar Photovoltaic Development to enable improved energy efficiency and reduced costs for business

description.narrative: The project is designed to provide assistance and technical support for industrial and commercial businesses to increase rooftop solar capacity in Ho Chi Minh City, Binh Duong, Dong Nai, and Long An to 1,200kW by December 2018. This is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
